AltName.entry: SHEFFIELD THAI BOXING GYMNASIUM; AKA WICKER MUAY THAI CAMP

Desc.entry: A non-profit organisation that teaches authentic Muay Thai classes for men, women and children. Has women only and junior only courses. Promotes gym events and fundraising events for local charities. Provides private tuition and runs seminars (master classes). Affiliated to the United Kingdom Muay Thai Federation. Fully insured.

Langs.entry: Finnish, French, Iranian, Polish, Slovakian, Spanish, Thai, Urdu

category.entry: MARTIAL ARTS - COMBINATION, KICK BOXING AND THAI BOXING
